trans-unit.source: *All fields are optional
exposed - Kotlin SQL framework
lets-plot - ggplot-like interactive visualization for Kotlin
numpy - Kotlin wrapper for Python NumPy package
spark - Unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing
trans-unit.target: spark-用于大规模数据处理的统一分析引擎

trans-unit.source: klaxon - JSON parser for Kotlin
deeplearning4j - Deep learning library for the JVM
gral - Java library for displaying plots
smile - Statistical Machine Intelligence and Learning Engine
trans-unit.target: 微笑-统计机器智能和学习引擎

trans-unit.source: krangl - Kotlin DSL for data wrangling
kravis - Kotlin grammar for data visualization
kmath - Kotlin mathematical library analogous to NumPy
mysql - MySql JDBC Connector
kotlin-statistics - Idiomatic statistical operators for Kotlin
koma - Scientific computing library
Kotlin (1.4.0) kernel for Jupyter.
libraries directory at the latest master branch of https://github.com/Kotlin/kotlin-jupyter repository
trans-unit.target: 库在最新的主分支目录 https://github.com/Kotlin/kotlin-jupyter 库

trans-unit.source: %output [options] - output capturing settings.
%trackClasspath - logs any changes of current classpath. Useful for debugging artifact resolution failures
trans-unit.target: %trackClasspath -记录当前类路径的任何更改。对于调试工件解析失败很有用

trans-unit.source: %trackExecution - logs pieces of code that are going to be executed. Useful for debugging of libraries support
trans-unit.target: %trackExecution -记录将要执行的代码段。对于调试库支持很有用

trans-unit.source: %use <lib1>, <lib2> ... - injects code for supported libraries: artifact resolution, default imports, initialization code, type renderers
trans-unit.target: %use <lib1>, <lib2> ... 为支持的库注入代码：工件解析，默认导入，初始化代码，类型渲染器

trans-unit.source: :classpath - displays current classpath
:help - displays REPL commands help
@file:DependsOn(<coordinates>) - adds artifacts to classpath. Supports absolute and relative paths to class directories or jars, ivy and maven artifacts represented by colon separated string
trans-unit.target: @file:DependsOn(<coordinates>) -将工件添加到类路径。支持类目录或jars，常春藤和maven工件的绝对和相对路径，用冒号分隔的字符串表示

trans-unit.source: @file:Repository(<absolute-path>) - adds a directory for relative path resolution or ivy/maven repository. To specify Maven local, use @file:Repository("*mavenLocal").
trans-unit.target: @file:Repository(<absolute-path>) -为相对路径解析或ivy / maven存储库添加目录。要指定Maven本地，请使用 @file:Repository("*mavenLocal") 。

trans-unit.source: class: fully-qualified class name for the type to be rendered
trans-unit.target: class ：要呈现的类型的完全限定的类名称

trans-unit.source: conda install -c jetbrains kotlin-jupyter-kernel (package home)
conda install -c jetbrains-dev kotlin-jupyter-kernel (package home)
dependencies: a list of library dependencies
imports: a list of default imports for library
init: a list of code snippets to be executed when library is included
trans-unit.target: init ：包含库时要执行的代码段列表

trans-unit.source: initCell: a list of code snippets to be executed before execution of any cell
trans-unit.target: initCell ：在执行任何单元之前要执行的代码段的列表

trans-unit.source: link: a link to library homepage. This link will be displayed in :help command
trans-unit.target: link ：指向图书馆主页的链接。该链接将显示在 :help 命令中

trans-unit.source: minKernelVersion: a minimal version of Kotlin kernel which may be used with this descriptor
trans-unit.target: minKernelVersion ：Kotlin内核的最低版本，可以与此描述符一起使用

trans-unit.source: properties: a dictionary of properties that are used within library descriptor
trans-unit.target: properties ：在库描述符中使用的属性字典

trans-unit.source: renderers: a list of type converters for special rendering of particular types
trans-unit.target: renderers ：类型转换器的列表，用于特定类型的特殊渲染

trans-unit.source: repositories: a list of maven or ivy repositories to search for dependencies
trans-unit.target: repositories ：用于搜索依赖项的Maven或Ivy存储库的列表

trans-unit.source: result: expression that produces output value. Source object is referenced as $it
trans-unit.target: result ：产生输出值的表达式。源对象被引用为 $it

trans-unit.source: shutdown: a list of code snippets to be executed on kernel shutdown. Any cleanup code goes here
trans-unit.target: shutdown ：将在内核关闭时执行的代码片段列表。任何清理代码都在这里

trans-unit.source: Adding new libraries
Alpha version. Tested with Jupyter 6.0.1 on OS X so far.
trans-unit.target: Alpha版本。目前在OS X上用Jupyter 6.0.1测试。

trans-unit.source: Attach remote debugger to JVM with specified port
trans-unit.target: 用指定的端口将远程调试器连接到JVM。

trans-unit.source: Autocompletion
Bintray JCenter

By default the return values from REPL statements are displayed in the text form. To use richer representations, e.g. to display graphics or html, it is possible to send MIME-encoded result to the client using the MIME helper function:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，REPL语句的返回值以文本形式显示。要使用更丰富的表示形式（例如显示图形或html），可以使用 MIME 帮助器功能将MIME编码的结果发送给客户端：

trans-unit.source: Check libraries directory to see examples of library descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 检查库目录以查看库描述符的示例。

trans-unit.source: Conda
Debugging
Default installation path is ~/.ipython/kernels/kotlin/. To install to some other location use option -PinstallPath=, but note that Jupyter looks for kernel specs files only in predefined places
trans-unit.target: 默认安装路径为 ~/.ipython/kernels/kotlin/ 。要安装到其他位置，请使用选项 -PinstallPath= ，但请注意，Jupyter仅在预定义的位置查找内核规范文件。

trans-unit.source: Default repositories
Dependencies resolving annotations
Dev: pip install -i https://test.pypi.org/simple/ kotlin-jupyter-kernel (package home)
trans-unit.target: 开发人员： pip install -i https://test.pypi.org/simple/ kotlin-jupyter-kernel （package home）

Error analysis
Example notebooks can be found in the samples folder

trans-unit.source: Fields for type renderer:
For private usage - add it to local settings folder <UserHome>/.jupyter_kotlin/libraries
trans-unit.target: 供私人使用-将其添加到本地设置文件夹 <UserHome>/.jupyter_kotlin/libraries

trans-unit.source: For sharing with community - commit it to libraries directory and create pull request.
trans-unit.target: 与社区共享-将其提交到库目录并创建请求请求。

HTML outputs can also be rendered with HTML helper function:
trans-unit.target: HTML输出也可以使用 HTML helper函数呈现：

trans-unit.source: If a library descriptor with the same name is found in several locations, the following resolution priority is used:
trans-unit.target: 如果在多个位置发现同名的库描述符,则使用以下解析优先级。

trans-unit.source: If library descriptor defines more than one property, property names should be used:
trans-unit.target: 如果库描述符定义了一个以上的属性,应使用属性名。

trans-unit.source: If you are maintaining some library and want to update your library descriptor, just create pull request with your update. After your request is accepted, new version of your library will be available to all Kotlin Jupyter users immediately on next kernel startup (no kernel update is needed).
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在维护某个库,并且想更新你的库描述符,只需创建一个带有更新的拉请求。当你的请求被接受后,新版本的库将在下次内核启动时立即提供给所有Kotlin Jupyter用户(不需要更新内核)。

trans-unit.source: If you don't want some library to be updated automatically, put fixed version of its library descriptor into local settings folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想让某个库自动更新,就把它的固定版本的库描述符放到本地设置文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If you have conda installed, just run the following command to install stable package version:
trans-unit.target: 如果已安装 conda ，只需运行以下命令以安装稳定的软件包版本：

trans-unit.source: If you use Jupyter Notebook as Jupyter client, you will also see that compilation errors and warnings are underlined in red and in yellow correspondingly. This is achieved by kernel-level extension of Jupyter notebook which sends error-analysis requests to kernel and renders their results. If you hover the cursor over underlined text, you will get an error message which can help you to fix the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用Jupyter Notebook作为Jupyter客户端,你也会看到编译错误和警告相应地用红色和黄色下划线。这是由Jupyter notebook的内核级扩展实现的,它向内核发送错误分析请求并渲染其结果。如果你将光标悬停在下划线的文本上,你会得到一个错误信息,这可以帮助你修复错误。

trans-unit.source: Line Magics
List of supported libraries:
Local settings folder (highest priority)
trans-unit.target: 本地设置文件夹(最高优先级

trans-unit.source: Maven Central
Name of the file is a library name that is passed to '%use' command
trans-unit.target: 文件名是传递给'%use'命令的库名。

trans-unit.source: Note that dependencies in remote repositories are resolved via Ivy resolver. Caches are stored in ~/.ivy2/cache folder by default. Sometimes, due to network issues or running several artifacts resolutions in parallel, caches may get corrupted. If you have some troubles with artifacts resolution, please remove caches, restart kernel and try again.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，远程存储库中的依赖项是通过Ivy解析器解析的。默认情况下，缓存存储在 ~/.ivy2/cache 文件夹中。有时，由于网络问题或并行运行多个工件解析，缓存可能会损坏。如果您在工件解析方面遇到麻烦，请删除高速缓存，重新启动内核，然后重试。

trans-unit.source: Pip

Press TAB to get the list of suggested items for completion. In Jupyter Notebook, you don't need to press TAB, completion is requested automatically. Completion works for all globally defined symbols and for local symbols which were loaded into notebook during cells evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 按 TAB 键获取完成建议项目的列表。在Jupyter Notebook中，您无需按 TAB 键，将自动请求完成。完成适用于所有全局定义的符号以及在单元格评估期间加载到笔记本中的本地符号。

Rich output
Run ./gradlew installDebug. Use option -PdebugPort= to specify port address for debugger. Default port is 1044.
trans-unit.target: 运行 ./gradlew installDebug 。使用选项 -PdebugPort= 可以指定调试器的端口地址。默认端口为1044。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is defined by json library descriptor. Descriptors for all supported libraries can be found in libraries directory. A library descriptor may provide a set of properties with default values that can be overridden when library is included. The major use case for library properties is to specify particular version of library. If descriptor has only one property, it can be defined without naming:
trans-unit.target: 此行为由 json 库描述符定义。在库目录中可以找到所有支持的库的描述符。库描述符可以提供一组具有默认值的属性，当包含库时可以覆盖这些默认值。库属性的主要用例是指定库的特定版本。如果描述符只有一个属性，则无需命名即可定义它：

To start using kotlin kernel inside Jupyter Notebook or JupyterLab create a new notebook with kotlin kernel.
trans-unit.target: 要开始在Jupyter Notebook或JupyterLab中使用 kotlin 内核，请创建一个带有 kotlin 内核的新笔记本。

trans-unit.source: To start using Kotlin kernel for Jupyter take a look at introductory guide.
trans-unit.target: 要开始为Jupyter使用Kotlin内核，请阅读入门指南。

trans-unit.source: To support new JVM library and make it available via %use magic command you need to create a library descriptor for it.
trans-unit.target: 要支持新的 JVM 库并通过 %use magic命令使其可用，您需要为其创建一个库描述符。
